snippet: In the real world, thieves who steal art are not debonair “Thomas Crown Affair” types.
abstract: Op-Ed article by security expert Anthony M Amore, citing massive art heist from Kunsthal Museum in the Netherlands, dispels notion that art thieves are like master criminals that people are familiar with from movies, contends such misguided notions about art thieves can get in the way of preventing more pieces of cultural heritage from being lost.
lead_paragraph: In the real world, thieves who steal art are not debonair “Thomas Crown Affair” types.

headline.seo: Debunking the Myth of Glamorous Art Thieves
